location.heading: SOUL UNDER & UPPER
location.description: You may go to this area near thousand sunny ship. Go down there's a cave underground. Behind of Kurama. That's where is the Soul Shop.

location.heading: JUTSU
location.description: Found in the Ramen Shop area. Near 5T Chakra.

location.heading: NEN
location.description: Nen gacha location is nearby Meteor 1M Strength.

location.heading: SAIYAN
location.description: Located on Lookout Island. Near 10M Strength.

tokens.heading: BUU - SAIYAN TOKEN
tokens.description: 1Qd HP Buu tokens can be used on Saiyan Gacha. Nearby 50Qd Boulder Strength.

tokens.heading: GON - NEN TOKEN
tokens.description: 1M HP Gon tokens can be used on Nen Gacha. Nearby 1M Meteor.

tokens.heading: ICHIGO - SOUL TOKEN
tokens.description: 1B HP Ichigo tokens can be used on Soul Gacha. Nearby Thousand Sunny.

tokens.heading: RENGOKU - NICHIRIN TOKEN
tokens.description: 1T HP Rengoku tokens can be used on Nichirin Gacha. Nearby Dark Palace 1SX Durability.

tokens.heading: SAITAMA - HERO TOKEN
tokens.description: 1QN HP Saitama tokens can be used on Hero Gacha. Nearby GYM.

tokens.heading: SAKURA - JUTSU TOKEN
tokens.description: 1K HP Sakura tokens can be used on Jutsu Gacha. Nearby Ramen 5T.
